definition: to look intensively/to feast one's eyes on

sentences.english: A road trip into the country can be a leisurely drive that lets you enjoy the scenic view.
sentences.chinese: 去郊外的自駕遊就從容到能讓你飽覽沿途風光了。

sentences.english: On their way to the campground, they enjoyed looking at the beautiful mountains and lakes.
sentences.chinese: 往露營地的一路上，他們飽覽了秀麗的湖光山色。

sentences.english: They stood on top of the hill， drinking in the beauty of the garden city.
sentences.chinese: 他們站在小山之巔，飽覽這花園城市的美景。

sentences.english: C. Rent a rowboat and ride on one of Chengde’s magnificent lakes.
And other visitors wanting quieter pursuits took in the blue bonnets in bloom.
sentences.chinese: 而其他想要尋幽探靜的遊客則在飽覽盛開的矢車菊。

sentences.english: Pending enjoying every day on this fascinating scene.
sentences.chinese: 正待飽覽這迷人的天都月景。

sentences.english: Today, we are going to take our audience on a tour of the scenic Lishan Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 那我們今天呢就帶大家去飽覽一下驪山的美景。

sentences.english: Here, you can have a panoramic view of the beautiful Xiangjiang River at night.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏您可以飽覽迷人的香江夜色。
